name: Cat&Laser
description:
Guide the cat to the green exit. Click the mouse to attract the cat, the lasers will distract it.

This was my first time participating in a GameJam, so its kind of a mess. i didn't have so much free time in the 3 days of the jam but I did my best.

Shout-out to my friend Minerva (@minervaandcast on instagram) for helping me with the level design, and, my father Francisco Ramos for the music loop.
